en.pageTitle: Rose Emojis 🌹 Copy and Paste - LaughingEmoji.net
en.metaDescription: Copy and paste beautiful rose emojis 🌹🥀 from the largest collection of floral emoticons. One-click copy for all your nature and plant expressions!
en.ogTitle: Rose Emojis 🌹 Copy and Paste - LaughingEmoji.net
en.ogDescription: The ultimate collection of rose emojis! Copy and paste 🌹🥀 and more beautiful rose emojis with one click.
en.exploreDescription: Explore and copy the most popular and beautiful rose emojis for your messages and social media.
en.roseEmojiMeaningsContent: The classic red rose emoji 🌹 symbolizes love, passion, and romance, often used on Valentine's Day. The wilted rose emoji 🥀 represents sadness, heartbreak, or the end of something.
en.roseEmojiUsageContent: Use 🌹 to express romantic feelings, appreciation, or simply to show you like roses. It can also be used in a political context to show support for Democratic Socialism. The 🥀 is for messages of mourning, heartbreak, or when you are feeling low on energy.
en.roseEmojiHistoryContent: The rose emoji 🌹 was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010. Interestingly, since before the 2016 US election, the emoji began to be used on social media to signal membership in the Democratic Socialists of America (DSA), as the red rose is their traditional symbol.
en.roseEmojiStoriesContent: The wilted rose emoji 🥀 gained significant popularity on TikTok, where users started using it to express heartbreak and grief, considering the traditional broken heart emoji 💔 to be overused.
en.footerText: © 2025 LaughingEmoji.net. All rights reserved. Rose Emojis 🌹

zh.pageTitle: 玫瑰花表情符号 🌹 复制粘贴 - LaughingEmoji.net
zh.metaDescription: 从最大的花卉表情符号合集中复制粘贴美丽的玫瑰表情符号 🌹🥀。一键复制所有玫瑰相关表情！
zh.ogTitle: 玫瑰花表情符号 🌹 复制粘贴 - LaughingEmoji.net
zh.ogDescription: 终极玫瑰表情符号合集！一键复制粘贴 🌹🥀 等美丽的玫瑰花表情符号。
zh.breadcrumb: 主页 > 玫瑰表情符号
zh.mainTitle: 🌹 玫瑰花表情符号：复制粘贴
zh.exploreDescription: 探索并复制最流行、最美丽的玫瑰表情符号，用于您的消息和社交媒体。
zh.roseEmojiMeaningsContent: 经典的红色玫瑰表情符号 🌹 象征着爱、激情和浪漫，通常用于情人节。枯萎的玫瑰表情符号 🥀 代表悲伤、心碎或某件事情的结束。
zh.roseEmojiUsageTitle: 🌹 玫瑰表情符号的使用场景
zh.roseEmojiUsageContent: 使用 🌹 来表达浪漫情感、感激之情，或者仅仅是表达你喜欢玫瑰。它也可以用于政治语境，表示对民主社会主义的支持。🥀 用于表达哀悼、心碎或感觉精力不济时。
zh.roseEmojiHistoryTitle: 🌹 玫瑰表情符号的发展历史
zh.roseEmojiHistoryContent: 玫瑰表情符号 🌹 是在 2010 年作为 Unicode 6.0 的一部分被批准的。有趣的是，在 2016 年美国大选之前，这个表情符号开始在社交媒体上被用来表示美国民主社会主义者 (DSA) 的成员身份，因为红玫瑰是他们的传统象征。
zh.roseEmojiStoriesTitle: 🌹 玫瑰表情符号的有趣故事
zh.roseEmojiStoriesContent: 枯萎的玫瑰表情符号 🥀 在 TikTok 上获得了极大的流行，用户开始用它来表达心碎和悲伤，认为传统的心碎表情符号 💔 已被过度使用。
zh.footerText: © 2025 LaughingEmoji.net. 版权所有。玫瑰花表情符号 🌹
